main.name: Sai Sriram Gundepalli
main.occupation: A Tech Enthusiast and Software Engineer Focused on Crafting Efficient, Secure & Scalable Applications !!!
main.bio: Hi there! I'm a software engineer with expertise in frontend & backend development. Passionate about cloud technologies & System Design.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me. Feel free to contact!

education.school: JNTUK University College of Engineering Vizianagaram
education.degree: Bachelor Of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering

description.description1: • Designed and developed the application from scratch, including UI mockups and full implementation across the stack.

description.description2: • Built responsive and modular UI using Angular, Bootstrap, and Web Components for seamless user experience.

description.description3: • Developed backend services using Node.js to handle data processing, user interactions, and API integrations.

description.description4: • Leveraged GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment workflows, enhancing code quality and team productivity.

description.description1: • Crafted user-centric UI/UX wireframes and mockups in Figma, transforming complex concepts into user-friendly designs

description.description2: • Engineered a persona-based social media platform utilizing ReactJS and NodeJS, achieving a 30% increase in user engagement and contributing to a community growth of over 1,000 active users within the first three months.

description.description3: • Optimized back-end performance through the implementation of ExpressJs and NodeJS, resulting in a 40% reduction in server response times and enhancing overall user experience by decreasing load times to under two seconds.

description.description4: • Implemented advanced authentication protocols using JWT, boosting security measures that decreased unauthorized access attempts by 80% and ensuring compliance with industry standards for user data protection.

description.description1: • Developed an engaging Single-Page Application (SPA) to modernize the banking experience through HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), and Angular 13, resulted in a notable increase in customer interaction levels of up to 30%.

description.description2: • Implemented responsive design techniques across platforms, enhancing user experience and leading to a 25% increase in overall traffic and a 10% boost in conversion rates.

description.description3: • Architected secure microservices using Java 8 and Spring Boot 2.7.0, leading to a 40% decrease in response time for RESTful Web Services.

description.description4: • Optimized data processing pipeline using Java Streams API and lambda expressions, reducing processing time by 40% and improving code maintainability with 30% fewer lines of code.
